name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leap Motion for Trello and JIRA

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab Trello and JIRA cards with Leap Motion controller.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension which utilises the Leap Motion Controller to be able to grab and move cards in Trello and Jira.
